title: Foundations of Multicultural Integrated Instructional Design: Blended Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learning Considerations for Instructional Design in Language Education for Learners with Diverse Cultural Backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental instructional design principles considering cultural contexts and apply them to specific cases
Learners can propose at least three effective culturally integrated teaching methods in blended learning environments
Learners can complete over 80% of activities in online/asynchronous learning environments through self-directed learning plans

resources: Casebook of Culturally Responsive Teaching Methods

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
